title: Roasted loin of lamb rolled in a sweet chilli jam served with pickled vegetables
description: Succulent lamb cooked in a sweet, sticky, chilli sauce with a hint of fresh Thai flavours to cut through the richness.Equipment and preparation: You will need a parisienne scoop.
ingredients: 2 lemongrass stalks, tough outer leaves removed, finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ cucumber, made into balls with a parisienne scoop
1 bunch baby turnips, trimmed and thinly sliced
1 bunch fresh radishes, trimmed and thinly sliced
¼ bunch fresh mint, leaves picked
